# cvs-button



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property          | Attribute           | Description                                                                                                               | Type                                              | Default    |
| ----------------- | ------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------- | ---------- |
| `ariaControls`    | `aria-controls`     | single element `id` of the container the button expands and collapses, use with `aria-expanded`                           | `""`                                              | `null`     |
| `ariaDescribedBy` | `aria-described-by` | single element `id` of the element containing description text                                                            | `""`                                              | `null`     |
| `ariaDisabled`    | `aria-disabled`     | set to `true` if the button is disabled                                                                                   | `boolean`                                         | `false`    |
| `ariaExpanded`    | `aria-expanded`     | indicate if expandable content is expanded or not                                                                         | `boolean`                                         | `false`    |
| `ariaLabel`       | `aria-label`        | gives accessible name, will override button text, do not use in conjunction with `aria-labelledby`                        | `""`                                              | `null`     |
| `ariaLabelledBy`  | `aria-labelled-by`  | one or more element `id`(s), that hold label text, will override button text, do not use in conjunction with `aria-label` | `""`                                              | `null`     |
| `ariaPressed`     | `aria-pressed`      | only used for toggle buttons, used to indicate if button is pressed or not, 'mixed' is not supported                      | `boolean`                                         | `false`    |
| `buttonType`      | `button-type`       | if toggle (role is generedated in HTML) else use type passed and append type='{buttonType}' to button                     | `"button" \| "reset" \| "submit" \| "toggle"`     | `'button'` |
| `color`           | `color`             |                                                                                                                           | `"danger" \| "plain" \| "primary" \| "secondary"` | `'plain'`  |
| `theme`           | `theme`             |                                                                                                                           | `"dark" \| "light"`                               | `'light'`  |
| `type`            | `type`              |                                                                                                                           | `"basic" \| "flat" \| "outline" \| "raised"`      | `'basic'`  |
